answer: The graph has period $6 \pi.$  The period of $y = a \sin bx$ is $\frac{2 \pi}{b},$ so $b = \boxed{\frac{1}{3}}.$
agents_response: The graph of $y = a \sin bx$ has period $\frac{2 \pi}{|b|},$ so the period of the graph above is $\frac{2 \pi}{|b|} = 6 \pi.$  Therefore, $|b| = \frac{1}{3},$ so $b = \boxed{\frac{1}{3}}.$
